pages.text: Braziers are extremely useful and are an alternative to the powered lanterns for players lacking in the tech-department. A brazier multiblock structure base will prevent hostile mobs up to 48 blocks, unlike a powered lantern which only prevents up to 32. A complete brazier can prevent up to 208 blocks in total.$(br2)However, each level that you add, it will increase the range

by 16 blocks. It is significantly easier and does not consume energy like a powered lantern does. $(br2)$(italic)$(l:https://github.com/antibang/BaerCraft/wiki/How-to-Construct-&-Information-About-the-Brazier)Here's my GitHub page I created with images showing how to construct the brazier structure and important information about it.
